QuestData.Title: Fate of the Titans
QuestData.Description: Norgannon's Core is not at this location. I am not sure why you seek it, $r, and I am equally unsure if you truly know the purpose of that which you seek.$B$BI would like you to aid me before I consider extending my assistance. I have recently encountered knowledge of the watcher, Thorim. His seat of power is contested, and his fate remains to be seen. This troubles me, for I do not know of the other watchers. Utilize this databank to examine their temples to the northeast and return the knowledge to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Creteus in the Foot Steppes has requested that you travel to the Temple of Invention, the Temple of Winter, the Temple of Life, and the Temple of Order and utilize the databank to examine each area.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you returned with the knowledge that I seek, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: The news you bear forth is grave indeed. I do not know the fate of the remaining watchers, but their absence spells dark times for all of the lands of Azeroth.$B$BI shall examine the knowledge contained in the databank that you have returned and attempt to fully assess the situation. I believe I am in possession of knowledge that you deem more pertinent at this moment however, so I shall allow you to partake in said wisdom first.
